params.from: The source address for the liquidity
params.lpTokenMinted: LP tokens received by the liquidity provider

params.from: The source address for the liquidity
params.lpTokenBurned: LP tokens burned from the liquidity provider

addDepositorsToAllowlist(address[]).details: The action can be done only by user with admins, owners or by approved rights

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets `amount` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. IMPORTANT: Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729 Emits an {Approval} event.

params.tokenAmounts: Array of amounts of tokens for deposit

returns.actualTokenAmounts: Arrays of actual token amounts after deposit

initialize(uint256,address[],address,uin.details: Can only be initialized by vault governance

params.nft_: NFT of the vault in the VaultRegistry
params.strategy_: The address that will have approvals for subvaultNfts
params.subvaultNfts_: The NFTs of the subvaults that will be aggregated by this ERC20RootVault
params.vaultTokens_: ERC20 tokens that will be managed by this Vault

params.token: Address of the token to check

returns._0: `true` if this token is managed by Vault

removeDepositorsFromAllowlist(address[]).details: The action can be done only by user with admins, owners or by approved rights

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

tvl().details: Generally it is the underlying token value of this contract in some other DeFi protocol. For example, for USDC Yearn Vault this would be total USDC balance that could be withdrawn for Yearn to this contract. The tvl itself is estimated in some range. Sometimes the range is exact, sometimes it's not

returns.maxTokenAmounts: Upper bound for total available balances estimation (nth tokenAmount corresponds to nth token in vaultTokens)
returns.minTokenAmounts: Lower bound for total available balances estimation (nth tokenAmount corresponds to nth token in vaultTokens)

params.lpTokenAmount: LP token amount, that requested for withdraw
params.minTokenAmounts: Array of minmal remining wtoken amounts after withdrawal
params.to: Address to which the withdrawal will be sent

returns.actualTokenAmounts: Arrays of actual token amounts after withdrawal

params._index: The index at which the value will be returned

DepositCallbackLog(string).notice: Emitted when callback in deposit failed

ManagementFeesCharged(address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when management fees are charged

PerformanceFeesCharged(address,uint256,u.notice: Emitted when performance fees are charged

ProtocolFeesCharged(address,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when protocol fees are charged

WithdrawCallbackLog(string).notice: Emitted when callback in withdraw failed

addDepositorsToAllowlist(address[]).notice: Add new depositors in the depositorsAllowlist

deposit(uint256[],uint256,bytes).notice: The function of depositing the amount of tokens in exchange

depositorsAllowlist().notice: List of addresses of depositors from which interaction with private vaults is allowed

initialized().notice: Checks if the vault is initialized

isVaultToken(address).notice: Checks if a token is vault token

lastFeeCharge().notice: The timestamp of last charging of fees

lpPriceHighWaterMarkD18().notice: LP parameter that controls the charge in performance fees

subvaultNfts().notice: Get all subvalutNfts in the current Vault

subvaultOneBasedIndex(uint256).notice: Get index of subvault by nft

totalWithdrawnAmounts(uint256).notice: Returns value from totalWithdrawnAmounts array by _index

totalWithdrawnAmountsTimestamp().notice: The timestamp of last updating totalWithdrawnAmounts array

tvl().notice: Total value locked for this contract.

vaultGovernance().notice: Address of the Vault Governance for this contract.

withdraw(address,uint256,uint256[],bytes.notice: The function of withdrawing the amount of tokens in exchange

userdoc.notice: Contract that mints and burns LP tokens in exchange for ERC20 liquidity.
